body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Mark Washington, and I'm from Car Dealership X. May I ask for your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Lori Bryant.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Lori. To assist you better, could you please provide us with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the twenty third of June, nineteen ninety eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Lori. Could you also share with us your residential address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my residential address is four five six Pine Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Lori. Is there anything else you'd like to share or ask regarding your privacy concern?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just feeling confused with the recent privacy policies. Can you help clarify them for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Lori. Let me explain the privacy policies to you. We value your privacy and aim to keep your information secure. Thank you for your time and sharing your concerns with us. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Have a great day, Lori, and thank you for contacting Car Dealership X. Goodbye.
